sentences.english: This paper describes the model test of a hyperbolic paraboloid latticed shell.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一个鞍形单层网壳的模型试验。

sentences.english: In addition, the stack tray can be easily dried since single deck thickness is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 另外，层叠式托盘降低了单层厚度，易于干燥。

sentences.english: Peristomial lip relatively thin, single layered.
sentences.chinese: 口围缘单层，薄而不明显外展。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare the sodium ferulate single-layer osmotic pump controlled release tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备阿魏酸钠单层渗透泵控释片。

sentences.english: Results At the 20th passage, the SHEE cell remained monolayer, anchorage-dependent and attachment-inhibited growth.
sentences.chinese: 结果细胞培养呈单层，锚定依赖和接触抑制生长。

sentences.english: This article introduces the structure and features of several kinds of synchronizers used in single-layer hotpress.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了单层热压机常见的几种同步装置的结构和特点。

sentences.english: This is an architecture with classical Chinese garden style.
sentences.chinese: 中式园林建筑单层硬山卷棚垂脊顶。

sentences.english: Auto settling & feeding, single layer or double layer packing film.
sentences.chinese: 自动理糖进料，单层或双层包装膜包装。

sentences.english: On the medullary substance surface, there is a layer of simple epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴小结的髓质外侧表面付有单层上皮。

sentences.english: In tissue culture, MDCK cells form tight epithelial monolayers with junctional complexes.
sentences.chinese: 在组织培养中，MDCK细胞能够形成上皮致密单层。

sentences.english: The simple single-layer mode was redefined with the introduction of a non-linear space.
sentences.chinese: 简单的单层模式被重新定义成用来接引的非线性空间。

sentences.english: Cylindrical orthogonal single-layer lattice shell structure with fringe truss is a new type structure.
sentences.chinese: 单层柱面正交异型网壳是一种新型的网壳形式。

sentences.english: You can identify single-stage paint by polishing the car.
sentences.chinese: 通过抛光可以断定是否是单层油漆层。

sentences.english: Methods Chondrocytes which were obtained from aborted fetal were cultured in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 方法水囊引产胎儿的软骨细胞体外单层培养。

sentences.english: It has been designed as single layer PCB, and therefore it is really easy to be produced at home.
sentences.chinese: 它被设计为单层PCB，因此非常容易在家自制。

sentences.english: The KCs proliferated to form a full layer 9 days later.
sentences.chinese: 培养至第9天，细胞接近铺满单层。
